member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO
member.summary: The HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO structure extends the HTTP_RESPONSE structure with additional information for the response.

member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO.Type
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the type of information contained in this structure.

member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the pInfo member.

member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO.pInfo
member.summary: A pointer to the structure when the InfoType member is HttpResponseInfoTypeMultipleKnownHeaders; otherwise NULL.
